# The Skia
The [color=#9370DB]Skia[/color] are noospheric spirits given form by disruptions in the fabric of reality. They are drawn to areas of high emotional energy, such as space stations filled with life and activity.
The Skia is a ghost role raondly available mid game. Your objectives are to reap the souls of specific members of the crew. Each soul you claim strengthens your connection to the material plane, allowing you to manifest more fully and gain new abilities.
# Abilities
You begin with several Skia specific abilities. - Shatter Lights: Lets out a blood curdling scream that breaks all lights within a 9 tile radius. - Techokinetic Pulse: Lets out a short range EMP that disables electronics within a 4 tile radius. - Phase Shift: Passively allows you to move through airlocks and doors. - Shroud: Move faster, deal more damage and heal over time while in the darkness. When exposed to any source of light you will take continual damage and be weakened. While stationary you are invisible. - Soul Reap: Interact with critically injured, sleeping or dead crew members to reap their soul and gain power. Doing so will increase the Glimmer rate on the station. - Shaded Rebirth: If you are killed, provided you are in darkness your body will regenerate after 30 seconds, allowing you to continue your mission. - Night Vision: You can see in the dark as if it were daylight. - Lifeseek: You can sense living within a 15 tile radius, even through walls.
# Psychic Powers
You have access to Noospheric Zap and Telekinetic Pulse immediately. As you reap more souls, you will be able to unlock additional psychic powers.
# Objectives
- Reap Soul: Reap the soul of your target. Cut the thread of fate and bring them to the afterlife. - Survive: Stay alive until the end of the round. You continually generate a low level of Glimmer over time.
